mapper.sql: appID, appUserID, wareID, oilID, appNumber, appDate, appReason, appState
mapper.insert: insert into apply_table (appID, appUserID, wareID, oilID, appNumber, appDate, appReason, appState) values (#{appID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appUserID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wareID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oilID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appNumber,jdbcType=REAL}, #{appDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{appReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into apply_table
appID,
appUserID,
wareID,
oilID,
appNumber,
appDate,
appReason,
appState,

mapper.update:
update apply_table
appUserID = #{appUserID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
wareID = #{wareID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
oilID = #{oilID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
appNumber = #{appNumber,jdbcType=REAL},
appDate = #{appDate,jdbcType=DATE},
appReason = #{appReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appState = #{appState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where appID = #{appID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update apply_table set appUserID = #{appUserID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, wareID = #{wareID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, oilID = #{oilID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, appNumber = #{appNumber,jdbcType=REAL}, appDate = #{appDate,jdbcType=DATE}, appReason = #{appReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appState = #{appState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where appID = #{appID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from apply_table left join user_table on apply_table.appUserID = user_table.userID left join house_table on apply_table.wareID = house_table.wareID left join oil_table on apply_table.oilID = oil_table.oilID left join manage_table on apply_table.appID = manage_table.appID where apply_table.wareID = #{wareID} and ( apply_table.appState = 1 or apply_table.appState = 2 or manage_table.manageState = 1 or manage_table.manageState = 2 or manage_table.manageState = 3 )

select * from apply_table left join user_table on apply_table.appUserID = user_table.userID left join house_table on apply_table.wareID = house_table.wareID left join oil_table on apply_table.oilID = oil_table.oilID left join manage_table on apply_table.appID = manage_table.appID where appState = 2

select * from apply_table left join user_table on apply_table.appUserID = user_table.userID left join house_table on apply_table.wareID = house_table.wareID left join oil_table on apply_table.oilID = oil_table.oilID where appID = #{appID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select * from apply_table left join user_table on apply_table.appUserID = user_table.userID left join house_table on apply_table.wareID = house_table.wareID left join oil_table on apply_table.oilID = oil_table.oilID left join manage_table on apply_table.appID = manage_table.appID where apply_table.wareID = #{wareID} and (manage_table.manageState = 4 or manage_table.manageState = 5)
